channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popups – WordPress Popup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popups – WordPress Popup

item.title: CVE-2022-2305|2024-08-03T00:32:09.697Z -- unknown -- popups%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20popup
item.description: The WordPress Popup WordPress plugin through 1.9.3.8 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
